content: Google Recorder (Pixel app) has no public API, no broadcast intents, and stores files in protected /data/data/ directory. No way to trigger actions on recording completion without root access.
Continuing to build custom recorder in android-recorder/ rather than trying to integrate with Google Recorder. Custom approach gives full control over recording lifecycle and post-recording triggers.

Researched Google Recorder API alternatives. Possible workarounds: ContentObserver on MediaStore (limited since Recorder uses private storage), Google Drive sync + Drive API polling, or building custom recorder (chosen approach).
